name: Market Intelligence & Trends
description: Strategic market and competitive intelligence: non-routine signals about market structure, competitor moves, customer/industry trends, and analyst/market reports that leadership should be briefed on. Excludes routine stock chatter, generic news, and day-to-day operational updates.
